content.description: The writer would like to introduce the quotation in sentences 12 and 13 (reproduced below) in a way that relates it to the argument presented in the passage.
content.question: Redouan Bshary offered his opinions on the study: “I never saw a cleaner swimming on its back, and I never saw a cleaner scratching its throat. These are new behaviors that are apparently tightly linked to the mirror.” Which of the following versions of the underlined text would best accomplish this goal?

choices.label: Biologist Redouan Bshary read about the study and said,
Someone who has studied cleaner wrasses is Redouan Bshary, who commented on the unexplainable behavior of the fish:
Redouan Bshary, a biologist familiar with cleaner wrasse behavior, found the study remarkable, stating,

content.answer: Redouan Bshary, a biologist familiar with cleaner wrasse behavior, found the study remarkable, stating,

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
